name: Followed Content & Members
description: Notifications about new content in areas and items you follow, or new content by members you follow

name: Mentions & My Content
description: Notifications when you're mentioned in content, or members interact with your content

name: Club Invitations & Management
description: Notifications for club invitations, or join requests (if you are a club leader)

name: Your Profile
description: Notifications about posts on your profile, replies to your status updates and when you get new followers

name: Moderation
description: Notifications about moderation reports and content, if you are a moderator

name: File Updates
description: Notifications about file updates in Downloads areas

name: Other
description: Other notifications not included in the above categories
